description:
More details to come, but please save the date!

Open to EVERYONE, Data Bristol and [Women's Tech Hub](https://www.wthub.org/what-we-do/networking/) team up to bring some great talks and some networking at our awesome hosts [Amdaris](https://amdaris.com/).

Arrive from 6pm. We'll have some data-related talks and a half time break for pizza and drinks. Plenty of time for networking and socialising.

Data Bristol is, and has always been, an inclusive group. Teaming up with WTH is a great opportunity to increase our support for equality and diversity.

Here's some links to Women's Tech Hub and Girl Geek socials you might like to check out:

**Facebook:**
[Bristol Girl Geek Dinners](https://www.facebook.com/groups/231632375942)
[Bath Girl Geek Dinners](https://www.facebook.com/groups/BathGirlGeeks)
[Womens' Tech Hub group](https://www.facebook.com/groups/201134810219833)
[Womens' Tech Hub Page](https://www.facebook.com/wthub.dit2017)
 
**Linkedin:**
[Womens Tech Hub Group](https://www.linkedin.com/groups/8494838/)
[Womens' Tech Hub Page](https://www.linkedin.com/company/21816989/admin/feed/posts/)

**X Pro (twitter):**
@Women’sTechHub
@bristolggd
@bathggd
@womentechfounders
title: Joint Talks with Women's Tech Hub
